title: Smoke And Fire VFX Simulation Pack
description: Smoke And Fire VFX Simulation Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Smoke And Fire sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/kc71Hy1uoz4


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 60 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Element 01_#[512,288].png 8192x4896

● Element 02_#[512,288].png 7680x4608

● Element 03_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Element 04_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Element 05_#[512,288].png 2560x1728

● Element 06_#[512,288].png 7168x4320

● Element 07_#[512,288].png 5632x3456

● Element 08_#[512,288].png 6656x4032

● Element 09_#[512,288].png 4096x2880

● Element 10_#[512,288].png 5120x3168

● Element 11_#[512,288].png 6656x4320

● Element 12_#[512,288].png 11264x6912


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
